description.value:
You prepare a fake ID, license, or other credential that might serve as a convincing prop. Attempt a hard or very hard Society check or a very hard Computers check.

Success You create convincing credentials and gain 1 EP you can use only when presenting some form of credential or form of identification.

Failure Your phony credentials have a glaring problem. You gain 1 EP that (unknown to you) grants no benefit when used.

Critical Failure As failure, but a PC who tries to use the Edge Point gets a critical failure, even if they use the Edge Point after rolling a failure.
